name: Hollywood on the Run - 3D jumping party runner dorm games!
name_original: Hollywood on the Run - 3D jumping party runner dorm games!
description:
Can you help the Celebs escape the Paparazzi?

Quick!!! Run fast, jump, turn, slide, and make sure you don't get caught!!

Make sure to grab power-ups which will help you advance faster!!!

Have fun!! and Hurry!
